overview: Turn your house into a Halloween haunted house party with Haunted Transylvania 2! Sing along and dance all night in this fun Halloween celebration for kids of all ages. Spend some time with the dancing Mummy, do the wave with Frankenstein and jump around with Dracula! I's the Halloween event you do not want to miss!
tagline: A dance party for kids of all ages!
title: Haunted Transylvania 2
